generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, including a directional arrow, and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks visible on both sides of the road, with pedestrians and some bicycle infrastructure.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and balconies is prominently visible on the left side of the road.
- wall: A graffiti-covered wall is visible on the right side of the road, behind some bollards.
- fence: A low fence or barrier made of vertical posts is visible along the right side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the grassy area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic sign poles and bollards along the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign with a white arrow and a red circle with a white line, indicating parking restrictions.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road, providing shade and greenery.
- terrain: Grass and some dirt are visible on the right side of the road, behind the fence.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Pedestrians are visible on the left sidewalk, walking or standing near the street.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a white car in the foreground, a green car, and a black car parked on the right.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
